00022 #ifndef _USB_H
00023 #define _USB_H
00024 
00025 /******************************************************************************
00026                    Define(s) section
00027 ******************************************************************************/
00028 // \cond
00029 // USB device API return values
00030 // Indicates the operation was successful
00031 #define STATUS_SUCCESS             0
00032 // Endpoint/device is already busy
00033 #define STATUS_BUSY                1
00034 // Operation has been aborted
00035 #define STATUS_ABORTED             2
00036 // Operation has been aborted because the device was configured
00037 #define STATUS_RESET               3
00038 // \endcond
00039 
00040 /******************************************************************************
00041                    Types section
00042 ******************************************************************************/
00043 // transaction callback type
00044 typedef void (* TransferCallback_t)(void *pArg, uint8_t status, uint16_t transferred, uint16_t remaining);
00045 
00046 BEGIN_PACK
00047 // Usb endpoint descriptor
00048 typedef struct PACK
00049 {
00050   uint8_t  bLength;          // Size of the descriptor in bytes
00051   uint8_t  bDescriptorType;  // Descriptor type
00052   uint8_t  bEndpointAddress; // Address and direction of the endpoint
00053   uint8_t  bmAttributes;     // Endpoint type and additional characteristics (for isochronous endpoints)
00054   uint16_t wMaxPacketSize;   // Maximum packet size (in bytes) of the endpoint
00055   uint8_t  bInterval;        // Polling rate of the endpoint
00056 } HAL_UsbEndPointDescptr_t;
00057 END_PACK
